title: Print, "Brocade of Flowers (Hana no Nishiki), No. 9", ca. 1910
markings: In graphite, lower left: Brocade of Flowers
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower left: [Japanese characters] / no. 9 / Hana no Nishiki.
description: A large iris, outer perianth leaves magenta; inner leaves white with purple tips, against neutral background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Brocade of Flowers (Hana no Nishiki), No. 9", ca. 1910.
ca. 1910. 40.8 x 27.9 cm (16 1/16 in. x 11 in.). Gift of Mary Rutherford Jay. 1948-134-64.
